document.full_text: as a former "american idol" judge, singer, songwriter and producer, kara dioguardi, made her mark offering no-nonsense feedback to contestants hoping for stardom on the popular singing talent contest.
document.title: a minute with: kara dioguardi about her return to tv
lines_and_colors: as a former "american idol" judge, singer, songwriter and producer, kara dioguardi, made her mark offering no-nonsense feedback to contestants hoping for stardom on the popular singing talent contest.
